meanings.sent1: The kids at the party were so zippy, running around and laughing.
meanings.sent2: She always has a zippy attitude, ready to tackle any challenge.
meanings.sent3: The zippy puppy chased its tail in circles, making everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her zippy spirit was like a bright spark in the dull room.
meanings.sent5: The zippy music pumped up the crowd, making them dance with joy.

meanings.sent1: The zippy rabbit darted across the field in a flash.
meanings.sent2: He typed with zippy fingers, finishing the report in no time.
meanings.sent3: The zippy delivery guy raced to drop off the package before the rain started.
meanings.sent4: Her zippy reflexes saved her from tripping on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: The zippy car zoomed past, leaving a trail of dust behind.

meanings.sent1: The zippy cartoon characters made the kids laugh out loud.
meanings.sent2: Her storytelling was always zippy, keeping everyone entertained.
meanings.sent3: The zippy dance moves of the performer brought cheers from the audience.
meanings.sent4: The zippy conversation at the table was filled with laughter and jokes.
meanings.sent5: The zippy colors of the painting seemed to dance on the canvas.
